body.p:
Morganfield
April 27th 1861
Hon -- B. Magoffin
Dear Sir
A bond executed by Peter Wilkins with several of the citizens of Union County among whom is the clerk & several members of the Bar -- as his secuirty -- has been forfeited.

Wilkins having run off -- I have been made acquainted with all the facts of the case. and I believe it is right & proper that the Governor should interpose his clemency and release these parties. Wilkins himself has left no property nor did he have any at the time. They trusted entirely to his honor -- and were -- And unless you do come to their aid. They will have the whole amount -- to pay --

Very truly yours &c
L. M. Lowe

Union Cir. Ct
$500 } For. Recog.
Jno. S. Gager & others --
Remission Issd
May 23d. 1861
